resources.name: en
resources.title: English
resources.string_upd: If you update path, all information from table below will be lost, but it will not influence on already transferred data.
resources.string_add:
If account with the same NickName already exists, overwrite its info.
This option is useful if you already have account on current version with the same Nickname as in Dolphin. If you enable this option all existed on UNA accounts will be updated using profiles' info from Dolphin and don't forget that info of your current logged member may be also updated and you can be logged out.
Use NickName instead of Profile's FullName
Transfer photo albums even if they are empty
Path to the Dolphin root and information from table below will be lost, Continue?
